#### [Draw Your Discoveries](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2022_DrawYourDiscoveries-1-1.pdf)

Create your own artwork inspired by the park!

[](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2022_WriteYourResponses-1.pdf)

#### [Write Your Response](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2022_WriteYourResponses-1.pdf)

Use sculptures at the park as inspiration for your own creative writing!

[](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/2023_Scavenger-Hunt2.0.pdf)

#### [Scavenger Hunt](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/2023_Scavenger-Hunt2.0.pdf)

Try to answer as many questions as you can while exploring the park! Hint: Many of the answers are found on the labels next to each sculpture

#### [Find the Sculpture](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2024_FindTheSculpture.pdf)

Can you find these sculptures in the park, using only their close-ups as clues?

[](https://www.franconia.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/2023_Scavenger-Hunt1.0-1.pdf)

Learn the differences between land art, public art, and sculpture!

admission_text:
# **Visit Us**

##### **The grounds of Franconia Sculpture Park** are open 365 days a year from 8am-8pm.

  * 50 acres of prairie and gravel paths
  * Over 100 public sculptures to explore
  * Accessible public restrooms (available during Franconia Commons open hours)
  * Two golf carts are available (April 15 to October 15) for a $20 rental fee 
    * last rental at 4pm
    * first come, first serve – golf carts are not reservable
    * golf carts are not available during events
  * Several picnic tables for public use
  * Dogs on leash are welcome, please clean up after them

[View our Photography/Videography Policy](https://www.franconia.org/photography-policy/)

##### **Franconia Commons is open:**

Apr. 15 – Nov. 14:  
Daily, 10am-5pm

Nov. 15 – Apr. 14:  
Friday-Sunday, 10am-4pm

Closed on National Holidays

  * Rotating exhibitions in Mardag Gallery
  * Gift shop
  * Accessible public restrooms
  * THC beverages and soda available for purchase
  * Outdoor patio and garden
  * Dogs are not allowed in Franconia Commons

## Contact Us

651-257-6668  
29836 St. Croix Trail  
Shafer, MN 55074

Email: [info@franconia.org](mailto:info@franconia.org)

## Accessibility

Franconia Sculpture Park operates with the objective to make its exhibition, programs and services accessible to all people, including individuals with disabilities.

  * At Franconia, the grounds are flat with gravel and mowed pathways.
  * All trails are accessible by electrically powered chairs, some trails a...
collections_text:
# Winter Hours Are Now in Effect

The Franconia Commons building is open Friday-Sunday 10AM-4PM. The grounds are open 365 days a year, 8AM – 8PM.

# Upcoming Events

[ JAN 17 Midwinter Celebration _4-7 PM_ | We'll celebrating winter's dark night with an evening of art, music, and the camaraderie of community ******_Register Here_** ](https://form.jotform.com/franconia/2026-midwinter-celebration) [ FEB 21 Snowshoe Tours _1 PM_ | Join Franconia staff & volunteers for a guided snowshoe tour ******_Register Here_** ](https://pci.jotform.com/franconia/snowshoe-tour-2026 ) [ FEB 28 Elderberry Syrup Workshop _1-3 PM_ | Learn how to make elderberry syrup, about the combined medicinal properties of the herbs used, and how to identify and harvest elderberries. ******_Register Here_** ](https://form.jotform.com/franconia/workshops) [ MAR 7 Snowshoe Tours _1 PM_ | Join Franconia staff & volunteers for a guided snowshoe tour ******_Register Here_** ](https://pci.jotform.com/franconia/snowshoe-tour-2026 )
